reviewText: this movie totally ROCKS THE HOUSE you get to see goku and baby-vegeta duke it out and some apperiances from some old time friends Kibito-Kai and Old Kai!!! Thats right the kais are back in action. As you get to see the mistical escipades of goku as he is lost into another demension (No not the hyperbolic time chamber or the relm of the Kais, but another demension you have probably never herd of before) by Kibito-Kai trying to save Goku's life.  This movie is great because it has humor some action and a whole lot of the stuff that makes you love dragonballz/gt you will truly love this movie!!!!!!!

This movie is a great addition to the dragonball GT bunch.  it finally shows Goku duke it out with baby-Vegeta.  you also get to see kibito kai and elder kai.  this movie is truly fantastic to add to the collection b/c it has action humor and everything that makes you love Gt the only bad part is that is is too short it only contains three episodes. but it is a wonderful dvd so enjoy.
